did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physdesc: Consists of one small, bound, handwritten book, with binding in poor condition.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Recipe Book, Collection #4035, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased July, 2002 from Green Valley Auctions, Inc., Mt. Crawford, VA.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The recipe book was part of the Lois Gaynor estate in Elkton, VA, which was auctioned in 2002.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This book was written in 1855 by an unknown person or persons probably in Rockingham County, VA, and documents mid-nineteenth century cooking practices. Contains handwritten recipes for breads, puddings, cakes, pickles, and other foods.
